Uses of Interface
paint.IPaintStrategy

  • Packages that use IPaintStrategy 
    Package Description
    controller  
    model  
    paint  
    sprite  

    • Uses of IPaintStrategy in controller

      Fields in controller with type parameters of type IPaintStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private BallGUI<IStrategyFac,IPaintStrategy> Controller.view
      starts off null but will be fine when the constructor is finished.

    • Uses of IPaintStrategy in model

      Methods in model that return IPaintStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPaintStrategy BallModel.loadPaintStrat(java.lang.String className)
      The following method returns an instance of an IPaintStrategy,
      IPaintStrategy BallModel.makePaintStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
      Returns an IPaintStrategy that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname.
      Methods in model with parameters of type IPaintStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BallModel.makeBall(java.awt.Component canvas, IUpdateStrategy strategy, IPaintStrategy paintStrat)
      Add a ball (sprite) to this ball world (dispatcher).

    • Uses of IPaintStrategy in paint

      Classes in paint that implement IPaintStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ADecoratorPaintStrategy
      Abstract class that provides default behavior for subclasses that will decorate another IPaintStrategy to add functionality to that strategy.
      class  APaintStrategy 
      class  BallPaintStrategy
      Paint a circle on canvas
      class  ClownfishImagePaintStrategy
      Paint strategy that paints a swimming clownfish as its image.
      class  CompositeFishPaintStrategy
      Subclass of MultiPaintStrategy that uses one EllipsePaintStrategy to draw body and one EllipsePaintStrategy to draw eye and one PolygonPaintStrategy to draw tail.
      class  EllipsePaintStrategy
      Paint strategy to paint an ellipse shape
      class  Fish1PaintStrategy
      Paint strategy that paints a fish-shaped Polygon generated by a Fish1PolyfonFactory.
      class  FixedColorDecoratorPaintStrategy
      Decorator paint strategy that decorates another IPaintStrategy and causes the painted color to always be a specified, fixed color.
      class  ImagePaintStrategy
      Paint strategy that paints an image from a file, scaled to the host Ball's radius.
      class  MultiPaintStrategy
      A composite design pattern extension of APaintStrategy that paints a set of paint strategies.
      class  ShapePaintStrategy 
      class  SquarePaintStrategy
      Paint strategy that paints a filled square with the Ball's radius.
      class  SuperMarioImagePaintStrategy
      Paint strategy that paints a running Super Mario as its image.
      class  UprightImagePaintStrategy
      An image painting strategy that adds a paintCfg override that keeps the image upright no matter which way it is going.
      class  UprightShapePaintStrategy
      A shape painting strategy that adds a paintCfg override that keeps the shape upright no matter which direction it is going.
      Fields in paint declared as IPaintStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IPaintStrategy IPaintStrategy.NullObject
      The singleton null object instance for this interface, which does nothing.

    • Uses of IPaintStrategy in sprite

      Fields in sprite declared as IPaintStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IPaintStrategy Ball.paintStrat
      The strategy this sprite uses to paint itself
      Methods in sprite that return IPaintStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPaintStrategy Ball.getPaintStrategy()
      Get the paint-strategy of this ball
      Methods in sprite with parameters of type IPaintStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Ball.setPaintStrategy(IPaintStrategy paintStrat)
      Set the paint-strategy of this ball, and initialize the strategy with the ball
      Constructors in sprite with parameters of type IPaintStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball(int radius, java.awt.Color color, java.awt.Point center, java.awt.Point vel, java.awt.Component canvas, IUpdateStrategy updateStrat, IPaintStrategy paintStrat)
      Create a ball that can move bounce update and paint
      EllipseBall(int radius, java.awt.Color color, java.awt.Point center, java.awt.Point vel, java.awt.Component canvas, IUpdateStrategy strategy, IPaintStrategy paintStrat)
      Create an ellipse ball
